nodes.text: Regent Administrator was a position held by the leader of the Alderaan Flotilla, a collection of starships that carried the Alderaanians who survived the destruction of their homeworld Alderaan. By the year 5 ABY, Eglyn Valmor held the role of regent administrator.
The title of regent administrator was first used in the novel Aftermath: Life Debt, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released released on July 12, 2016.
